channel.title: Need help with Auto-Restarter
channel.description:
OK. I found a TUT for it on Rs-server.net. (For those wanting the link here it is: http://rs-server.net/forums/showthread.php?t=3134)
Anyway back to business. It's saying its suppose to run endserver.bat which supposedly ends the server obviously... But, the problem is, it doesn't... All it does is open the file, which has like one half of a sentence in it saying [code]tskill java /a[/code]
and it does nothing.
Tasks does open runserver.bat but it doesn't close the first one. Does anyone know how to fix it and ACTUALLY make it turn off the server?
Thanks in advance.[br][size=1]Posted at: 16 October 2006, 09:43:58[/size][hr]Can someone PLEASE help?? I really need 2 fix this damn thing..

item.title: Need help with Auto-Restarter
item.dc:creator: @l_o_l l o l
item.description:
@l_o_l wrote:

Argh! We need some Java SuperMan to help OR SOMEONE THAT HAS A DAMN WORKING AUTO-RESTARTER THATS NICE ENOUGH TO HELP!![br][size=1]Posted at: 16 October 2006, 12:50:03[/size][hr]Anyone know how to fix?!?!?!

PLEASE!![br][size=1]Posted at: 17 October 2006, 03:15:57[/size][hr]Can anyone help meh PLEASE!!![br][size=1]Posted at: 17 October 2006, 08:57:14[/size][hr]CAN ANYONE HELP AT ALL??? :([br][size=1]Posted at: 18 October 2006, 02:56:07[/size][hr]Holy Noob on me. I fixed my own Auto-restarter!!! WOOOT!!!

I put a tut in server tuts LOL links here if u guys want it: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,28514.0.html

Read full topic
